price: እነዚያ ከምእምናን ሌላ ከሓዲዎችን ወዳጆች አድርገው የሚይዙ እነሱ ዘንድ ልቅናን ይፈልጋሉን ልቅናውም ሁሉ ለአላህ ብቻ ነው፡፡
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّخِذُونَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۚ أَيَبۡتَغُونَ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ فَإِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yattakhidhūna al-kāfirīna awliyāa min dūni al-mu'minīna ayabtaghūna ʿindahumu al-ʿizata fa-inna al-ʿizata lillahi jamīʿan
